field.name: URL
field.description: URL to the camera video stream.

field.name: Width
field.description: Width in pixels of the video.

field.name: Height
field.description: Height in pixels of the video.

field.name: Transport
field.description: Transport protocol used to transfer stream.

field.name: Container
field.description: Video Container Format used to encapsulate stream.

field.name: Video Stream
field.description: Video Stream Format used to transfer stream.

field.name: Audio Stream
field.description: Audio Stream Format used to transfer stream.

field.name: Image Type
field.description: Image Format, in case camera supports still images.

field.name: Enabled
field.description: If the camera is enabled or not.

field.name: Angle
field.description: Rotation of camera around an imaginary vertical axis (looking left-right). Value must be of an angle unit.

field.name: Elevation
field.description: Rotation of camera around an imaginary horizontal axis (looking up-down). Value must be of an angle unit.

field.name: Rotation
field.description: Rotation of camera around an imaginary depth axis (tilting head). Value must be of an angle unit.

parameter.name: Angle
parameter.description: Rotation of camera around an imaginary vertical axis (looking left-right). Must have the same resolution and unit as the value in the field with the same name, if available.

parameter.name: Elevation
parameter.description: Rotation of camera around an imaginary horizontal axis (looking up-down). Must have the same resolution and unit as the value in the field with the same name, if available.

parameter.name: Rotation
parameter.description: Rotation of camera around an imaginary depth axis (tilting head). Must have the same resolution and unit as the value in the field with the same name, if available.
